basic.description: This course introduces statistical inference, estimation theory, model building, and forecasting methods. Emphasis is on model building and policy analysis. Extensive use is made of PC econometric software. This course is intended for non-Economics majors and does not count toward the requirements of any graduate degree offered by the Department of Economics.
basic.subject: ECO
basic.title: Introduction to Econometrics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ECO 2013; ECO 2023; and STA 2023, STA 2122, or STA 4321; or instructor permission.
